jp_text: 私の望みはな クラウド

jp_text: この星を船として 宇宙の闇を旅することだ
google_translated: This star is to travel the darkness of the universe as a ship

en_text: ...just as my mother did long ago.
jp_text: カつて母がそうしたようにな

en_text: We will find a new planet eventually,
jp_text: やがて我らは新しい星を見いだ し
google_translated: Eventually we see a new star

en_text: and construct a shining future there.
jp_text: その地で輝げる未来を創造する
google_translated: Create the future that shines in that land

en_text: And what will happen to this planet?
jp_text: この星はどうなる?

en_text: Who knows? That's up to you.
jp_text: さあ・ ・ ・おまえ次第だな

en_text: What has made you so strong?
jp_text: ほう 何がおまえを強く した ?

en_text: I was thinking of a parting gift for you.
jp_text: おまえヘの贈り物を考えていた・・・
google_translated: I was thinking about your gift ...

en_text: Kneel down and show me how you look when you're begging for mercy.
jp_text: 跪き 許しを請う姿を見せてくれ
google_translated: Show me how to ask for forgiveness

en_text: Do you remember the pain you once tasted, Cloud?
jp_text: あの時の痛みを憶えている? クラウド
google_translated: Do you remember that time of that time? Cloud

en_text: Allow me to give you yet another taste of that unforgettable agony!
jp_text: 今再び 忘れられぬ痛みを刻もう
google_translated: I will not forget any pain again now

en_text: What is the most important thing to you?
jp_text: おまえの最も大切なものは ?
google_translated: What is your most important thing?

en_text: Will you grant me the pleasure of taking it away?
jp_text: それを奪う喜びをくれないか?
google_translated: Can you give me a pleasure to take it away?

en_text: If it were me, I wouldn't be throwing in the towel yet!
jp_text: 俺ならまだあきらめないぜ
google_translated: I still do not give up yet

en_text: No matter how hopeless the situation seemed.
jp_text: たとえ絶望的な状況でもな
google_translated: Even if it is a desperate situation

en_text: Embrace your dreams!
jp_text: 夢を抱きしめろ

en_text: And... never, ever let go of your pride as a SOLDIER.
jp_text: そして どんな時でも ソルジヤーの誇りは手放すな
google_translated: And don't let go of the soregear at any time

en_text: Well, you never really managed to become a SOLDIER.
jp_text: ま ソルジャーにはならなかったープど ハー卜の間題だ ハ一卜の
google_translated: Soljac's no longer has a good idea

en_text: Need me to lend a hand?
jp_text: 手・ ・・ 貸してほしいか?
google_translated: Hand ... Do you want to lend me?

en_text: I mean, you kicked his ass once, right?
jp_text: 一度 倒れした相手だろ 楽勝じゃない
google_translated: It is not easy to win the opponent who has fallen once

en_text: Right.
jp_text: ああ・・・

en_text: Don't you ever forget again...
jp_text: もう・・・ 忘れるなよ

en_text: ...that I'm the proof you once existed.
jp_text: 俺が おまえの生きた証だ
google_translated: I'm a student who has a life

en_text: So pathetic. you understand nothing.
jp_text: ・・・哀れだな あんたは何もわかっていない
google_translated: ... I'm sorry I do not know anything

en_text: There is nothing that isn't important to me.
jp_text: 大切じやないものなんかない
google_translated: I do not have to be important

en_text: ...will not become a memory.
jp_text: 思い出にはならないさ

en_text: Brother...
jp_text: 兄さん・・・

en_text: You can stop trying so hard, okay?
jp_text: もう　頑張るの やめよう?

en_text: Is that you, Mother?
jp_text: 母さん・・・なの?

en_text: Let's go back to everyone, okay?
jp_text: みんなのところ 帰ろう?

en_text: Cloud can do anything if he tries.
jp_text: やれば出来るんだから クラウドは
google_translated: Because I can do it, the cloud is

en_text: You were always with us, weren't you?
jp_text: ずっと　いてくれたんだよね
google_translated: It has been a long time

en_text: Let's go back together.
jp_text: 一緒に帰ろう

en_text: Let's all play... together.
jp_text: みんなで遊ほ'う

en_text: Cloud will come back too, won't he?
jp_text: ・・・クラウ ドも帰ってくるよな

en_text: Mother?
jp_text: 母さん・・・?

en_text: Who cares? It means you're loved.
jp_text: いいじやないの 慕われて

en_text: I don't want such a big kid.
jp_text: こんな大きな子　いりません
google_translated: I do not like such a big child

en_text: She's saying there's no place for you here.
jp_text: 残念 おまえの居場所 ここにはないってよ
google_translated: Sorry for your place where you are here

en_text: Welcome home.
jp_text: おかえりなさい

en_text: There are still children who have Geostigma.
jp_text: まだ星痕が麦消ない子もいるんだ
google_translated: There are still children who have no fall

en_text: It's fine now.
jp_text: もう 大丈夫

en_text: All right, let's all jump in and celebrate!
jp_text: さあ じゃんじゃん飛び込め

en_text: Everything's fine now, right?
jp_text: もう 大丈夫 だね
